inclusion.criterion: first-ever ischemic stroke in the distribution of middle cerebral artery
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: computed tomography or magnetic resonance imaging on the brain

inclusion.criterion: Age ranged from 33 to 66 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Duration is at least 4 months from stroke onset
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients never received speech therapy before
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Educated for at least 10 years of education
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: stroke, other clinical forms of aphasia
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: unstable cardiac dysrhythmia or cardiac pacemaker
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients with severe grade of weakness which interfere with writing ability
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has chronic post stroke nonfluent aphasia due to first-ever ischemic stroke in the distribution of middle cerebral artery. He is right handed and had a duration of at least 4 months from stroke onset.
